item.title: More Experience, More Overwhelmed - Dev Leader Weekly 114
item.description: Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I discuss how to navigate feeling overwhelmed as a developer in a senior+ role. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2025/11/01/more-experience-more-overwhelmed-dev-leader-weekly-114

item.title: College Developer Struggles - Dev Leader Weekly 113
